column5: Was just wondering if there is any ice at Virginia Beach.  Thats where I usually get out first.  Hoping to get out Christmas weekend or maybe even the weekend before that if its safe enough.  Thanks!  Tony
it sure looks like it's coming along real nice at Virgina beach  check out the photo here http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=48923
virgina beach live surf cam Wait thru the commercial you can then check it out till you get their.   Art
LOL  that would be Virginia Beach......ontario canada

Thanks Terry.....you were the guy who pointed the Niagara boys to Willow Beach last year.I was a hero (taking your advice). Watching and waiting for Simcoe . Off next week, do you know if they're walking out on Nip yet ?
